### Verify contracts using truffle-plugin-verify

#### Matic
truffle run verify ChildMintableERC20@0xF0A1A50b6C990A3064BAa4F13EBf67dce158F256 --forceConstructorArgs string: --network maticdev


#### Ethereum
truffle run verify RootMintableERC20@0xfECbEbA0027aE303746092a86C01bd8785e90609 --forceConstructorArgs string: --network goerli
